title: Artificial diets can manipulate the reproductive development status of predatory ladybird beetles and hold promise for their shelf-life management
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Li Zhu, Xin Chen, Jia Lv, Zhendong Huang, Zhanxu Pu, Shunmin Liu
